html:
8.22.18  8:17 pm   In the last chorus when you sing "finally on my way" your voice has a weird jumpy sound sound on the run you do on 'way', was that like you moving your Adam's apple with your finger or some effect you put in your voice?

     probably just bad editing

      Also I just noticed that secret fuck.

     there must be a way to combine the 2 some how

     moo

     it's just common sense really

     does the duck love you too

     i might get another one, for the other side

     that's not when i stopped that's when i started

8.22.18  5:04 pm   Scariest language?

     english

8.22.18  4:31 pm   complain about spotify on twitter imo

     i've never complained on twitter and i'm not going to start now

8.22.18  4:20 pm   How do you deal with yourself when you find that you are scared and procrastinating on the things you know you really want to do? 

     already beat that, now just need to solve doing the things i do 4 times as fast

8.22.18  4:11 pm   What are some typical breakfasts you have? Kinda wanna know what I'm donating for. 

     rent

8.22.18  3:58 pm   When does the new video come out

     sept 4 or die trying

8.22.18  3:50 pm   who is the elite

     you, and me

8.22.18  3:48 pm   Thoughts on atonal melody/music?

     just when you think something's atonal, there is always someone around to say 'nope that's tonal. atonal music has to be Less tonal' so i would guess the sound of a jackhammer is atonal but i will have to check with the atonality police

8.22.18  3:07 pm   are you ever going to make songs without videos again?

     i don't know

8.22.18  2:32 pm   Why'd you stop updating the notebook?

     i still do but i mostly discovered a more advanced way of expressing myself

8.22.18  2:02 pm   Which member of the bill wurtz band is the rudest 

     the manager

8.22.18  1:54 pm   Where did you get your (v i b e s)? Are they for sale?

     look around you

8.22.18  1:47 pm   So most of these songs come from what you've already written in late 2000s - early 2010s, I assume. Are you picking these by order of when you wrote them, or do you do by random/what looks most appealing?

     in 2012 i learned how to update/finish/fix. and i did that nonstop throughout 2012 and 2013 and later. that makes it an entire catastrophe just to fiture out even when a song was written. it's well documented but most songs have multiple dates they were worked on. so it wouldn't even be possible to figure out that order. i have used brute force randomization, but more renctly i've been using a hybrid semi-randomization, where i make manual exclusions and then randomize amongst the finalists. also in the last 2 years i have allowed myself to pick fragments, which means the majority will be current writing (outside, movie star, got to know what's, etc)

8.22.18  1:43 pm   When you make your video, do you consider how the eye tracks across the screen, like for any given frame what the person will be looking at and where it will go in the next few frames?

     yes

8.22.18  1:40 pm   What question do you get asked the most on here?

     98% of the questions are fortnite questions

8.22.18  1:02 pm   hi I'm from Neptune any good places to eat on earth or what

     how about the neptune diner. i've never been there but it might be in your wheel house

8.22.18  12:59 pm   Why is today not Friday the 13th?

     it's a different day instead

8.22.18  12:51 pm   The release of Hallelujah was approximately 2 months from hello sexy pants

     right. isn't that obnoxious

8.22.18  12:48 pm   Hallelujah seems to be like a follow up to the day goes on because the day goes on has a lot of lyrics about leaving and never coming back and the lyrics are very happy like someone going on an adventure and leaving the old behind and hallelujah is a lot more mellow and kind of feels like the same person from the day goes on but on his journey trying to figure out where to go.

     they were written immediately after each other. day goes on was second. although both songs were actually started years before

8.22.18  12:45 pm   does bread equal plant

     you have to bake it

8.22.18  12:42 pm   what is the prime time?

     you never know when a time is going to be prime

8.22.18  12:40 pm   Do you make all of the videos by yourself?

     yes

8.22.18  12:10 pm   what's the silliest thing that could be done

     silly things cannot be done

8.22.18  12:06 pm   hey bill wurtz can you give me some tips on becoming popular online

     first you must become 100% popular in your imagination

8.22.18  11:22 am   What is your highest cowbell score?

     999999999 but the game doesn't go any higher

8.22.18  10:30 am   Will you ever create a banger that I can play on my DJ sets?

     sure

8.22.18  10:20 am   What is something profound?

     doors, and windows

8.22.18  10:20 am   what's something that made you laugh a lot?

     spreadsheets, and databases

8.22.18  10:04 am   what was the timeline like for writing hallelujah

     chorus pretty much written 8.21.12. the rest was written may 22-24, 2016, and the recording in 2018 adheres exactly to the 2016 writing

8.22.18  9:54 am   8.21.18  9:28 pm Can you please explain what bVI bVII I means? Is the b a flat? So like in the key of C would that be Ab Bb C? is that right 

     they are using roman numerals which is very common but i perosonally can't stand it. i'm not quick at reading roman numberals and they all look so similar. i prefer to use arabic numbers (1,2,3) and if you arrange them properly it can be fine. but yes you were right about what chords those were. and when you see someone use a lowercase roman numeral that probably means minor. but i prefer to use "min" or a minus sign, after the letter, to mean minor

8.22.18  9:35 am   any plans for guest features in your videos.

     how about you

      are you alone in this musical world. do you want to be?

     i haven't really thought about it

8.22.18  9:16 am   Do you value writing or performing more?

     i wonder if they can be combined some how

8.22.18  9:06 am   do you remember the guy on youtube who made crazy assumptions out of your hi i am steve video,if so,why did you remove it?

     remove what

8.22.18  9:00 am   You know like every 7 years enough cells have died and been replaced that you're in a new body basically? 

     seems older some how

     destiny

     why aren't you

     yes but you can't poop it there

     that's for you to decide on our new game show

     holy crap, is this a common rule for schools? do i need to start making my mixes more mono, cuz i spread the last one way the hell out, more than normal actually
